name: Find These Hidden Fruits! Trivia Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Is it dangerous to rub an anaconda's head while it is eating fruit?
questions.explanation:
banana.

	Is it dangerous to ruB AN ANAconda's head...? I know how to make a delicious dessert from crepes (thin pancakes), sliced bananas, brown sugar, apricot jam, whipped cream, and toasted almonds.

questions.text: Even though we grow more varieties of fruit here in California, my home, London is my favorite city in the world!
questions.explanation:
melon.

	Even though we grow more varieties of fruit here in California, my hoME, LONdon is our favorite city in the world! There are watermelons, honeydew melons, cantaloupes, and more.

questions.text: The woman goes to the refrigerator and takes out some chilled fruit.
questions.explanation:
mango & mangoes.

	The woMAN GOes to the refrigerator and takes out some chilled fruit. Mangoes are juicy tropical fruits with firm, yellowish-red skin and large pits inside.

questions.text: The lion, whose scientific name is Felis Leo, ranges over large grassland territories in Africa; it eats meat, not grass or fruit.
questions.explanation:
orange & oranges.

	The lion, whose scientific name is Felis LeO, RANGEs over large grassland territories in Africa.... Orange trees have fragrant, white blossoms. It's a tradition for brides to wear orange blossoms in their hair.

questions.text: Emma and Vicki will pass out the health books, and we'll read the chapter on fruit.
questions.explanation:
kiwi.

	Emma and VicKI WIll pass out the health books.... The kiwi is a small tropical fruit with fuzzy brown skin and bright green pulp with crunchy seeds.

questions.text: Handing him a piece of fruit, Peter told Greg, "Rap eventually became a popular musical style in the United States, but today most people call it hip-hop."
questions.explanation:
grape.

	Handing him a piece of fruit, Peter told GreG, "RAP Eventually became a popular musical style in the United States, but today most people call it hip-hop." There are pale green grapes, dark purple ones, and reddish ones.

questions.text: I like your picture of a fruit basket, but after you use the markers, cap each one so it won't dry up.
questions.explanation:
peach.

	...after you use the markers, caP EACH one so it won't dry up. I love fresh peach pie with whipped cream. Peaches have fuzzy skin and beautiful orange pulp edged with rose.

questions.text: The sandwich maker called out, "Isabelle Archer--rye toast, turkey, Swiss cheese, mustard, pickles, no mayonnaise--and a piece of fruit!"
questions.explanation:
cherry.

	The sandwich maker called out, "Isabelle ArCHER--RYe toast, turkey, Swiss cheese, mustard, pickles...." Did you know that not all cherries are red? Some are golden-colored.

questions.text: I don't know why my pop lumps everyone under twelve together--some kids like fruit and others don't.
questions.explanation:
plum.

	I don't know why my poP LUMps everyone under twelve together.... These days prunes are called "dried plums." I guess the name "prune" isn't attractive to buyers.

questions.text: My family and I (I hope) are all going to Hawaii this winter, and I can't wait to eat some tropical fruit.
questions.explanation:
pear.

	My family and I (I hoPE)ARe all going to Hawaii this winter.... I love ripe pears, but they don't taste good if they are under- or overripe.
